product_name: Jambu Crimson Mary Jane Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wear the Jambu Crimson Mary Jane Shoes at the office, out to dinner and for an evening stroll by the water. With reliable comfort and versatile style, they're made for long days of work and play. Suede-leather uppers with classic Mary Jane style provide a cute, casual look; cross-straps features rip-and-stick closure for easy on/off. Memory-foam midsoles contour to your feet to provide custom-fit comfort. Durable rubber outsoles on the Jambu Crimson Mary Jane Shoes provide traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the Jambu Crimson Mary Jane Shoes at the office, out to dinner and for an evening stroll by the water. With reliable comfort and versatile style, they're made for long days of work and play.
